text: Werner Faymann (born 4 May 1960 in Vienna) is an Austrian politician. He belongs to the Social Democratic Party of Austria. He was transport, innovation and technology minister from 2007 to 2008. His party won the elections of the National Assembly in 2008. As a result he was the Federal Chancellor of Austria from 2008 to 2016.Austrian Chancellor, Werner Faymann, Resigns as Right Wing Rises May 9, 2016 He was succeeded by Christian Kern. ==References== ==Other websites== *Homepage of the Austrian Chancellor Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Chancellors of Austria Category:Government ministers of Austria Category:Politicians from Vienna
title: Werner Faymann
